t: Creating a store for multiple brands from one manufacturer
s: Great question! Stores are done at the brand level so unfortunately there is no way to have separate brands under one store.

t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: Enroll your brand in Amazon Brand Registry to unlock tools designed to protect and build your brand, creating a better experience for your Amazon customers.

November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: Multiple Brands Under One Amazon Account
s: Hi there, I would greatly appreciate your help. We own two Amazon brands under separate accounts, each with its own business information. We want to launch a new brand through Brand Registry using one of these accounts, essentially managing multiple brand stores under one account.

t: Do I need to create multiple companies if I want to sell a private label product on Amazon? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 3): You don't need to create multiple companies if you want to sell a private label product on Amazon.
